title: Official Android T (13) build is out for the Asus Zenfone and ROG devices series.
content: We proud to share with you the new Omnirom based on Android 13.0 for the Zenfone6/6Z, Zenfone7, Zenfone8, ROG 2 and ROG 3. In the same time, all this devices have the firmware with the vendor images build from source. So no need to worries with the ASUS FW based.
